our_partners.name: OUR PARTNERS
our_partners.content:
Our strategic and implementing partners are UAE-based entities that work with a global network of professionals and organisations from the field. Together with our partners, we are providing communities with access to safe and clean water by implementing sustainable water projects and identifying innovative sustainable solutions to water scarcity. 

 Get to know our partners:

partners.title: Dubai Electricity and Water Authority
partners.content:
Suqia is annexed to Dubai Electricity and Water Authority, DEWA, by law number 3, which was issued by His Highness Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum in 2015.
Since our establishment, DEWA has been supporting Suqia’s mission and vision by providing workforce, expertise, financial support, and encouraging volunteerism among its employees.
In addition, DEWA continues to play a key role in developing Suqia’s research and development work to provide innovative and sustainable water solutions. The authority also provides its expertise when assessing and analysing new research and development opportunities.

partners.title: Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Humanitarian & Charity Est.
partners.content:
In 2015, Suqia partnered with the Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Humanitarian and Charity Est., MBRHC, a sister entity under the umbrella of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives.
Through their vast network of international field partners, MBRHC have been supporting our mission to provide clean drinking water to those in need.

partners.title: Emirates Red Crescent
partners.content:
In 2014, His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President and Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai launched the Suqia initiative to provide clean water to five million people worldwide.
Following the successful initiative outcomes, His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE and Ruler of Dubai, established Suqia UAE as a non-profit organisation by law in March 2015. Today, Emirates Red Crescent continues to play a key role in Suqia’s leadership through membership in the Board of Trustees.

together.content: TOGETHER, WE CAN END THE WATER CRISIS AND MAKE CLEAN WATER ACCESSIBLE TO EVERYONE. JOIN US AND BECOME A PARTNER.
